manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Support for Redmine issue tracker and project management. Redmine version 1.3.0+ is recommended for best compatibility.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: com.kenai.redminenb.api > 1.9, org.apache.commons.lang > 2.4.0, org.apache.commons.logging > 1.1.0, org.netbeans.api.progress/1 > 1.20.2, org.netbeans.modules.autoupdate.services > 1.28.2, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking = 201203012225, org.netbeans.modules.options.api/1 > 1.18.1, org.openide.awt > 7.39.1, org.openide.dialogs > 7.15.1, org.openide.loaders > 7.32.1, org.openide.nodes > 7.16.1, org.openide.util > 8.6.1, org.openide.util.lookup > 8.3.1
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: A NetBeans plugin for integration with Redmine.
